TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Color extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示 ARGB (Alpha、紅、綠、藍) 色彩。

span.span: Represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的色彩由使用的屬性結構。Named colors are represented by using the properties of the structure. 如需有關這些色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Colors by Name](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332)。For more information about these colors, see [Colors by Name](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332). 每個像素的色彩表示為 32 位元數字：8 位元用於 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色 (ARGB) 的每個。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每四個元件是從 0 到 255，0 代表不含濃度，表示完整濃度 255 的數字。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. Alpha 元件指定色彩的透明度：0 是完全透明的而且完全不透明 255。The alpha component specifies the transparency of the color: 0 is fully transparent, and 255 is fully opaque. 若要判斷 alpha、 紅色、 綠色或藍色色彩元件，請使用， ， ，或屬性，分別。To determine the alpha, red, green, or blue component of a color, use the , , , or property, respectively. 您可以使用其中一種建立自訂色彩方法。You can create a custom color by using one of the methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，以及的屬性，和成員。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`表單的方法事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . summary.span: 取得這個 結構的 Alpha 元件值。

span.span: Gets the alpha component value of this structure.

value.span: 這個 的 Alpha 元件值。

span.span: The alpha component value of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個像素的色彩表示為 32 位元數字：8 位元用於 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色 (ARGB) 的每個。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). Alpha 元件指定色彩的透明度：0 是完全透明的而且完全不透明 255。The alpha component specifies the transparency of the color: 0 is fully transparent, and 255 is fully opaque. 同樣地，為 255 的值代表不透明的色彩。Likewise, an value of 255 represents an opaque color. 從 1 到 254 的值代表半透明色彩。An value from 1 through 254 represents a semitransparent color. 色彩變得更透明為接近 255。The color becomes more opaque as approaches 255. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，以及的屬性，和成員。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`表單的方法事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . param.span: 數值，指定 32 位元 ARGB 值。

span.span: A value specifying the 32-bit ARGB value.

summary.span: 從 32 位元的 ARGB 值建立 結構。

span.span: Creates a structure from a 32-bit ARGB value.

returns.span: 這個方法建立的 結構。

span.span: The structure that this method creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元組順序的 32 位元 ARGB 值是 AARRGGBB。The byte-ordering of the 32-bit ARGB value is AARRGGBB. Aa，表示最大顯著性位元組 (MSB)，是 alpha 元件值。The most significant byte (MSB), represented by AA, is the alpha component value. 第二、 第三和第四個位元組，分別由 RR，GG、 BB、 色彩元件紅色、 綠色和藍色，分別是。The second, third, and fourth bytes, represented by RR, GG, and BB, respectively, are the color components red, green, and blue, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立三個筆刷、 每個不同的色彩。Creates three brushes, each a different color. 每個用來建立筆刷的結構從 32 位元 ARGB 值建立。Each structure that is used to create a brush is created from a 32-bit ARGB value. - 您可以使用虛數的三角形，將三個圓圈。Uses an imaginary triangle to position three circles. - 繪製三個重疊的圓圈，每一個頂點的三角形，不同的筆刷用於每個圓圈上置中。Paints three overlapping circles, each centered on one vertex of the triangle, using a different brush for each circle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立不透明的色彩，請設定`alpha`到 255 之間。To create an opaque color, set `alpha` to 255. 若要建立半透明色彩，請設定`alpha`為從 1 到 254 的任何值。To create a semitransparent color, set `alpha` to any value from 1 through 254. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 建立（紅色、 綠色、 藍色），才會進行三個色彩元件值的結構。Creates structures from the three color component values (red, green, blue). 三個建立結構，其中每一種主要色彩。Three structures are created, one for each primary color. 2. 逐一查看變更色彩的 alpha 值的 alpha 值的範圍。Iterates through a range of alpha values, changing the alpha value of a color. 3. 每次反覆運算中，將筆刷的色彩設定修改後的色彩，然後繪製矩形以顯示色彩。During each iteration, sets the color of a brush to the modified color and paints a rectangle to show the color. 4. 重複步驟 2 和 3，每一種主要色彩。Repeats steps 2 and 3 for each primary color. Alpha 值絕不會是完全不透明，矩形會重疊，因此您會取得色彩結合的效果。The alpha value is never fully opaque and the rectangles overlap so you get color-combination effects. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

Alpha 值絕不會是完全不透明，矩形會重疊，因此您會取得色彩結合的效果。The alpha value is never fully opaque and the rectangles overlap so you get color-combination effects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先定義的色彩也稱為已知的色彩，而且會以表示的項目列舉型別。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體結構， `redShade`，以供進行比較。Creates an instance of a structure, `redShade`, to be used for comparisons. - 逐一查看列舉型別項目，若要尋找所有已知的色彩可做為相同的亮度`redShade`。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have the same lightness as `redShade`. 找不到 15 的相符或迴圈計數器的值大於最後一個時，會終止反覆項目項目。The iterations are terminated when 15 matches are found or the value of the loop counter is greater than the last element. - 每次反覆運算中，將儲存項目-如果它會比對的準則-陣列中。During each iteration, saves the element - if it matches the criteria - in an array. - 您可以使用筆刷來繪製矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 繪製所代表之色彩的第一個矩形`redShade`。The first rectangle is painted the color represented by `redShade`. 每個其他矩形繪製符合的亮度`redShade`。Each of the other rectangles is painted a that matches the lightness of the `redShade`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個像素的色彩表示為 32 位元數字：8 位元用於 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色 (ARGB) 的每個。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每四個元件是從 0 到 255，0 代表不含濃度，表示完整濃度 255 的數字。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. 同樣地，是從 0 到 255，0 表示沒有綠色到 255 個代表完全綠色的值。Likewise, is a value from 0 to 255 with 0 representing no green and 255 representing fully green. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，以及的屬性，和成員。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`表單的方法事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會執行比較的 ARGB 值。This property does not do a comparison of the ARGB values. 因此，當屬性會套用到藉由建立結構方法，傳回`false`，即使 ARGB 值符合為系統色彩的 ARGB 值。Therefore, when the property is applied to a structure that is created by using the method, returns `false`, even if the ARGB value matches the ARGB value of a system color.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 的名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回使用者定義色彩的名稱，如果 color 建立自一個名稱或已知的顏色的名稱。This method returns either the user-defined name of the color, if the color was created from a name, or the name of the known color. 自訂色彩，RGB 值會傳回。For custom colors, the RGB value is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到包含名為按鈕的表單`Button2`，並將關聯`Button2_Click`方法的按鈕事件。Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button2` and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個像素的色彩表示為 32 位元數字：8 位元用於 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色 (ARGB) 的每個。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每四個元件是從 0 到 255，0 代表不含濃度，表示完整濃度 255 的數字。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. 同樣地，Likewise, 是從 0 到 255 之間，其中 0 表示沒有紅色到 255 個代表完全紅色的值。 is a value from 0 to 255 with 0 representing no red and 255 representing fully red. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，以及的屬性，和成員。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`表單的方法事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 ToArgb() cil managed

summary.span: 取得這個 結構的 32 位元 ARGB 值。

span.span: Gets the 32-bit ARGB value of this structure.

returns.span: 這個 的 32 位元 ARGB 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元組順序的 32 位元 ARGB 值是 AARRGGBB。The byte-ordering of the 32-bit ARGB value is AARRGGBB. Aa，表示最大顯著性位元組 (MSB)，是 alpha 元件值。The most significant byte (MSB), represented by AA, is the alpha component value. 第二、 第三和第四個位元組，分別由 RR，GG、 BB、 色彩元件紅色、 綠色和藍色，分別是The second, third, and fourth bytes, represented by RR, GG, and BB, respectively, are the color components red, green, and blue, respectively ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 逐一查看列舉項目，若要尋找具有非零的綠色元件和零值的紅色元件，並不是系統色彩的所有已知的色彩。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have a non-zero green component and a zero-value red component, and that are not system colors. - 每次反覆運算中，將儲存項目-如果它會比對的準則-陣列中。During each iteration, saves the element - if it matches the criteria - in an array. - 您可以使用筆刷來繪製矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 每個矩形繪製符合準則的第一個項目符號中所述。Each of the rectangles is painted a that matches the criteria stated in the first bullet. 名稱和其元件的值也會顯示。The name of the and its component values are also displayed. 此範例會顯示特定已知的色彩、 色彩和其四個元件值的名稱。This example displays certain known colors, the names of the colors, and their four component values. 方法當成預備步驟用來顯示元件值。The method is used as a preliminary step to display the component values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Drawing.KnownColor ToKnownColor() cil managed

summary.span: 取得這個 結構的 值。

span.span: Gets the value of this structure.

returns.span: 如果 是藉由使用 方法或 方法從預先定義色彩建立，則為 列舉型別的項目，否則為 0。

span.span: An element of the enumeration, if the is created from a predefined color by using either the method or the method; otherwise, 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先定義的色彩也稱為已知的色彩，而且會以表示的項目列舉型別。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. 當方法會套用至藉由建立結構方法，傳回 0，即使 ARGB 值符合預先定義的色彩的 ARGB 值。When the method is applied to a structure that is created by using the method, returns 0, even if the ARGB value matches the ARGB value of a predefined color. 也會傳回 0，當套用至藉由建立結構與字串名稱不是有效的方法。 also returns 0 when it is applied to a structure that is created by using the method with a string name that is not valid.

summary.span: 將這個 結構轉換為人們可讀取的 (Human-Readable) 字串。

span.span: Converts this structure to a human-readable string.

returns.span: 如果 是藉由使用 方法或 方法從預先定義色彩建立，則為這個 名稱的字串，否則為 ARGB 元件名稱及其值所組成的字串。

span.span: A string that is the name of this , if the is created from a predefined color by using either the method or the method; otherwise, a string that consists of the ARGB component names and their values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先定義的色彩也稱為已知的色彩，而且會以表示的項目列舉型別。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. 當方法會套用至藉由建立結構方法，傳回字串，包含 ARGB 元件名稱和其值，即使 ARGB 值符合的 ARGB 值預先定義的色彩。When the method is applied to a structure that is created by using the method, returns a string that consists of the ARGB component names and their values, even if the ARGB value matches the ARGB value of a predefined color. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 逐一查看列舉項目，若要尋找具有非零的綠色元件和零值的紅色元件，並不是系統色彩的所有已知的色彩。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have a non-zero green component and a zero-value red component and that are not system colors. - 每次反覆運算中，將儲存項目-如果它會比對的準則-陣列中。During each iteration, saves the element - if it matches the criteria - in an array. - 您可以使用筆刷來繪製矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 每個矩形繪製符合準則的第一個步驟中所述。Each of the rectangles is painted a that matches the criteria stated in the first step. 名稱和其元件的值也會顯示。The name of the and its component values are also displayed. 此範例會顯示特定已知的色彩，並使用顯示色彩及其四個元件值的名稱。This example displays certain known colors and uses to display the names of the colors and their four component values. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到包含名為兩個按鈕的表單`Button1`和`Button2`。Paste the code into a form that contains two buttons named `Button1` and `Button2`. 呼叫`UseTransparentProperty`表單的建構函式中的方法。Call the `UseTransparentProperty` method in the form's constructor.
